title: גיק ג'וב: אוסף משרות היי-טק חמות במיוחד - 9 בדצמבר
description: גם השבוע אספנו עבורכם את המשרות החמות ביותר בהיי-טק הישראלי, על-מנת לעזור לחברינו שמחפשים משרה חדשה. בין משרות השבוע: Security Researcher, מנהל/ת מוצר, אנליסט/ית מערכות מידע ועוד
articleBody:
גם השבוע אספנו עבורכם את המשרות החמות ביותר בהיי-טק הישראלי, על-מנת לעזור לחברינו שמחפשים משרה חדשה. בין משרות השבוע: Security Researcher, מנהל/ת מוצר, אנליסט/ית מערכות מידע ועוד

אחת המטרות לשמן ייסדנו את גיקטיים היתה לקדם את קהילת ההייטק בארץ. בפוסט הגיקג’וב השבועי, אנחנו מפרסמים חלק מהמשרות המפורסמות בלוח משרות ההייטק החדש של גיקטיים. אם אתם מעוניינים למצוא משרות נוספות או לפרסם משרות שלכם, אתם מוזמנים לעשות זאת באמצעות לוח המשרות החדש שלנו – Geeklist. שתפו את הפוסט והעבירו הלאה כדי לעזור לחברות להפיץ את המשרות ולגולשי גיקטיים למצוא את העבודה החדשה שהם מחפשים.
Be a part of the server team and work on a variety of challenging SW projects  – web/windows services, back-end/front-end services, web sites, DB.
Developing with Microsoft cutting edge technology – C#, .NET 4.5, WCF,ASP.NET, MS-SQL.
Work with a dynamic young group of people in a start up environment.
Requirements:
B.Sc. in Computer Science/ Software Engineering – grade average of 85+.
At least 3 years of proven experience.
Strong knowledge in Microsoft technology in particular and other programming languages in general.
Strong knowledge in DB.
Strong knowledge in Client/Server architecture.
Strong knowledge in web technologies.
To send a CV for the position of SW Engineer-Server Team

Working as part of our R&D group team, the Java developer will be responsible for full lifecycle development of our systems, from initiation to design, architecture, development, integration and deployment. You will Operate as the Development group’s focal point for data solutions and will report directly to the R&D group manager .You will be working on a sophisticated, large-scale data platforms which provide several products in the Ad industry.
Requirements:
Bsc. In computer science / SW Eng. or related field from a well know university or MAMRAM/8200.
7+ years’ experience in development.
5+ years of Experience in server side Java development in Linux environment.
Experience with open source/Apache technologies like: Hibernate, Spring, Tomcat, Spark, Hadoop.
Tech oriented person with ability to examine and investigate new technologies.
Experience as Tech lead or team architect – big advantage.
Experience with data and Big Data technologies.
Experience with AWS cloud computing infrastructure & Services (Kinesis, EC2, Auto scaling, ELB, RDS etc) – Must.
Experience with large-scale cloud based systems including performance & scalability – Big Advantage.
Experience with Agile Scrum, continues delivery and integration environments – must.
Deep understanding of OOD, Java internals, multithreading and parallel processing.
Ability to mentor team members.
Experience in the online Ad industry and programmatic area – Big advantage.
To send a CV for the position of Java Developer

Do you want to get your hands on the most cutting edge technology before it reaches the Market?
Intel’s SW group is looking for a talented Security Researcher.
In this position you will work on ensuring security aspects of Intel software and firmware products. You will be a member of the security evaluation team, located in Haifa, encompassing all aspects of the architecture, design and implementation.
How your day will look like (when you are not working on your own personal initiatives):
Identify flaws and vulnerabilities in complex secure systems.
Reverse engineering and white box SW analysis.
Working with software, hardware, embedded systems, cryptography etc.
Provide feedback to development teams.
Requirements:
Curiosity, Passion and Initiative.
Attacking state of mind.
Ability to learn and integrate new information very quickly.
Familiarity with security attacks and mitigation.
Out-of-the box, abstract thinking. Creative problem solving.
It will be great if you would also have:
Experience using IDA, idapython, ollydbg, gdb.
Experience reverse engineering binary applications.
Experience with vulnerability assessment and exploit development.
Experience with operating system and compiler internals.
Experience with embedded devices.
Knowledge of cryptographic principles.
To send a CV for the position of Security Researcher

We are looking for talented, creative and energetic individuals to join us. Our awesome front end team is creating the next generation of digital education platforms.
You will work in a productive and inspirational R&D environment, using cutting edge technologies.
Requirements:
B.Sc. in Computer science or equivalent practical experience.
Expert in (at least) one software development language.
Good understanding of web platforms.
Experience solving cross-browser/cross-platform compatibility issue.
Experience in Mobile Dev:IOS, Android, windows mobile.
To send a CV for the position of Front End Expert

The Security Researcher will join the Security Innovation Group in Radware’s CTO Office, which researches new network attacks and technologies. Research is focused on new threat domains, including analysis of attack tools and malware, attacking techniques, development of mitigation techniques, and understanding and penetrating into cyber operations. The position requires an all-around player with the inclination and capabilities for research skills, rapid code development, initiative, and ownership.
Requirements:
Over 8 years of work experience, and at least 3 years in a security position.
An all-around player capable of research, coding, and out-of-the-box thinking.
Proven experience in security research and malware analysis.
Excellent understanding of networking design principles and protocols (such as TCP/IP and IPv4).
English written and verbal communication skills, ability to write articles.
To send a CV for the position of Researcher

As a Product Manager at Windward, you will be responsible for product planning and execution throughout the lifecycle of a SaaS-based product. In this role you will be responsible for gathering and prioritizing product and customer requirements, defining the product vision, and working closely with our R&D, Sales and Marketing teams to ensure revenue and customer satisfaction goals are met and that the product supports the company’s overall strategy and goals.
In this position you will:
Lead the ideation, technical development, and launch of innovative products.
Establish shared vision across the company by building consensus on priorities leading to product execution.
Drive product development with a team of world-class engineers and designers.
Integrate usability studies, research and market analysis into product requirements to enhance user satisfaction.
Define and analyze metrics that inform the success of products.
Understand Windward’s strategic and competitive position and deliver products that are recognized as best in the industry.
Maximize efficiency in a constantly evolving environment where the process is fluid and creative solutions are the norm.
Requirements:
5+ years Product Management experience.
Exceptional communication and presentation skills.
Exceptional organizational and analytical skills.
Understanding of the technical architecture of complex and highly scalable web applications and/or SAAS products.
Experience designing simple and intuitive user interfaces – ability to create examples through wireframes and mockups.
Experience developing SAAS / web application products, technologies and platforms – an advantage.
BA/BS in Computer Science or related technical field – an advantage.
To send a CV for the position of Product Manager


Our software development team is responsible of data reduction technologies inside IBM’ high end storage controllers. The team is responsible for design, development, and all technical related aspects of the core of the technology, dealing with different storage platforms, complex distributed systems, and flash systems serving enterprise level requirements of high throughput, and low latency traffic. The selected candidate will be part of a small and professional team that develops the cutting edge technology. The team writes code in C++ for Linux platform, and collaborates with global teams in IBM.
About IBM Real-time Compression:
Based on the Storwize acquisition, IBM Real-time Compression provides state of the art data reduction technology designed to improve efficiency by compressing and deduplicating data, enabling you to store many times as much data in the same physical disk space – with no performance degradation, and with associated savings in capital, operational, maintenance and management resources. Unlike other approaches to data reduction, IBM Real-time Compression is designed to be used with active primary data such as production databases and VM applications. IBM Real-time Compression engine is is integrated into all of IBM’s high-end storage controllers.
Requirements:
3- 8 years C++ programming experience using object-oriented methodology.
Highly motivated and independent, good in solving complex problems.
A team player.
Grade Sheet must be provided with the application.
B.Sc /B.A. in computer science/computer engineering or equivalent.
Knowledge in storage -advantage.
Experience in performance-oriented development, multi-tasking-advantage.
Experience in developing enterprise class software-advantage.
Experience in server-side development -advantage.
Development experience on Linux OS-advantage.
To send a CV for the position of Experienced Software Developer – RTC

A successful, fast growing Internet company is looking for a System Analyst. The System Analyst Specialist has a leading role in the R&D department by understanding the business requirements and designing the systems where these requirements are implemented.
Requirement gathering, gap analysis, writing high level and detailed specification documents, DB modeling, interfaces specification, support to R&D and QA teams, leading complex integration and customization efforts.
Requirements:
Knowledge of system analysis tools and techniques,knowledge of DB modeling, user interfaces design and API definitions.
Familiarity with internet related technologies (web services/rest protocols).
Proven experience as a systems analyst – at least 3 years.
Experience in Financial systems, e-commerce or payment processing – advantage.
Experience in complex systems- mandatory.
Experience as a programmer (C#, ASP.NET, JAVA) – advantage.
Ability to understand source code.
Experience in BPM processes – advantages.
BA in systems information engineering or computer science – significant advantage.
General systematic view, professionalism, good personal relations, team player, responsibility, ability to work in uncertain situations under time pressure.
SafeCharge is proud to be to an equal opportunity employer .
To send a CV for the position of System Analyst

We’re looking for a talented full stack developer to hold a challenging, pivotal position in the core team of a new and promising start-up located in Kfar Saba.The position includes infrastructure design, planning and development, writing server and client components, which are supposed to communicate with other server components on the platform.
Requirements:
BS degree in Computer Science, similar technical field of study or equivalent practical experience.
3-5 years of development experience Python – A must.
Experience working with the following: web application development, Unix/Linux .environments, distributed and parallel systems, networking, developing large software systems, security software development.
Familiarity with Linux environment, End to end understanding of systems infrastructure, good.
Front-end capabilities (HTML5 , JavaScript, CSS) – a big advantage.
To send a CV for the position of Full Stack Developer-Python

A well-established company in the field of networking is seeking for a Senior Algorithm Developer for a New Innovation Team leading next generation state of the art technologies. The position includes designing development roadmaps,seeking new technologies,designing network related algorithms,algorithms implementations,lab testing and documents and patents designing.
You get to join a new innovation team – next generation technologies.
Requirements:
BA /BSc in computer science/Mathematics- Mandatory. MSc – advantage.
3+ year experience as a Network Algorithm Engineer – a plus.
Network system architecture and router/switch algorithm- a plus.
Experience with PCB – a plus.
Experience in DSP/ Image Processing.
Strong in defining and solving both theoretical and practical problems- Must.
Ability complexed problems, designing state of the art solutions.
Strong knowledge in system modeling, simulation, and prototyping.
Proven track record on system/algorithm design and evaluation- a plus.
To send a CV for the position of Senior Algorithm Developer​
